item.description:
This is a great gangster film and if you have never seen it on the big screen, now is your chance!

We will start to gather by 6:00 and head in for seats at 6:30.


Reservoir Dogs 20th Anniversary Event
Tuesday, December 4 at 7:00pm (local time)*
One day only!

Mr. White: "If you shoot this man, you die next. Repeat. If you shoot this man, you die next. "

In 1992, Quentin Tarantino stunned audiences, amazed critics and re-defined cinema with the release of Reservoir Dogs. To celebrate the 20th anniversary of this groundbreaking debut and the legendary career that followed, NCM Fathom Events , Miramax and IGN are bringing Reservior Dogs back to theaters for a special one time event. 

Movie Plot:  After a simple jewelery heist goes terribly wrong, the surviving criminals begin to suspect that one of them is a police informant.

Will also feature trailers hand-picked by Quentin Tarantino which influenced his work, and exclusive new interviews.

This will sell out, so buy your tickets in advance!  For more information and to buy tickets go to:

http://www.fathomevents.com/classics/event/reservoirdogs.aspx?d=12/4/2012
item.how_to_find_us: I will be wearing a meetup pin. The movie is showing upstairs, I will grab a table by the windows at the top of the escalator.
item.name: Reservior Dogs (7PM Show)
